title: Na3V2(PO4)3-decorated Na3V2(PO4)2F3 as a high-rate and cycle-stable cathode material for sodium ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11862-11871
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01653J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yi Yang, Guo-Rong Xu, An-Ping Tang, Jun-chao Zheng, Lin-Bo Tang, Ying-De Huang, He-Zhang Chen
Na3V2(PO4)2.75F0.75/C (NVPF·3NVP/C) composite cathode material was synthesized by sol–gel method. Compared to other composite materials, NVPF·3NVP/C electrode materials exhibit excellent rate performance.
